infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Speedy Van uses your location while you're using the app to show your position to customers during active deliveries and help you navigate to pickup and drop-off addresses.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Speedy Van uses your location in the background to provide real-time tracking to customers during active deliveries, ensuring they can see your estimated arrival time and current position throughout the delivery.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Speedy Van uses your location in the background to provide continuous real-time tracking to customers during active deliveries, even when the app is not in the foreground.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Speedy Van uses your camera to take delivery proof photos and update your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Speedy Van allows you to upload a profile photo from your library if you prefer not to take a new picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Speedy Van saves delivery proof photos to your photo library so you can keep a record of completed deliveries.
